document.full_text: two oil traders and their trading firms, already facing regulatory charges of alleged manipulation in the market for crude oil futures, were sued thursday by a derivatives trader who claims he was harmed by their activities.
document.title: investor sues oil traders over alleged manipulation
lines_and_colors: two oil traders and their trading firms, already facing regulatory charges of alleged manipulation in the market for crude oil futures, were sued thursday by a derivatives trader who claims he was harmed by their activities.
